articles.title: Belmonte feted in Argentina mayors’ summit
articles.description: Quezon City Mayor Joy was hailed as the guest of honor in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and was awarded a Special Diploma by government officials at the Buenos Aires City Legislature Palace, where the C40 World Mayors Summit was held.

articles.title: ‘Severe turbulence’ hits Spain-Argentina flight; 12 injured, aircraft cabin damaged
articles.description: Though the airline said in a statement that no one was seriously injured, media reports have emerged that one of the passengers broke the septum of the nose.
articles.content:
A dozen passengers flying from Spain to Argentina were injured earlier this week when their flight hit turbulence and allegedly threw them up against the cabin ceiling, reported UK media on Friday.

articles.title: Flight Turbulence Injures 12 After 'Everyone Just Went Flying': Report
articles.description: A passenger from the "nightmare" flight from Spain to Argentina said on Twitter that "everyone just went flying" when the plane hit rough air.
articles.content:
A dozen people were injured when a flight from Spain to Argentina hit turbulence, CNN reported.
Aerolíneas Argentinas said in a statement that most injured people were not wearing seatbelts.

articles.title: Families, Your YouTube Premium Plan is Getting More Expensive
articles.description: Users in the U.S., Canada, U.K., Argentina, Turkey, and Japan will see a price hike next month.
articles.content:

articles.title: Argentina fear no one at World Cup, says Lionel Messi
articles.description: Argentina began their 2018 World Cup campaign with a 1-1 draw against Iceland a game in which Messi missed a penalty and finished second in their group before being knocked out by eventual winners France in the last 16.
articles.content:
